committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to make the first Monday in February a legal public holiday for Lincoln's Birthday.

summary.text: Declares the first Monday in February as a legal public holiday for Lincoln's Birthday (presently celebrated February 12).

titles.title: A bill to make the first Monday in February a legal public holiday for Lincoln's Birthday.
